# Type Alias: DeepValue\<TValue, TAccessor\>

```ts
type DeepValue<TValue, TAccessor> = unknown extends TValue ? TValue : TAccessor extends DeepKeys<TValue> ? DeepRecord<TValue>[TAccessor] : never;
```
